text:
e="preserve">Muslim Evloev (11 June 1995 – 6 August 2020) was a Russian-Kyrgyzstani freestyle wrestler. He won a gold medal in his event at the Asian Wrestling Championships and at the Islamic Solidarity Games. Evloev was born in Malgobek, Russia.
He was killed in August 2020 during a shoot out in a counter-terrorism operation in Nazran, Russia at the age of 25.
